text: Capt Henry Whitby, Royal Navy Henry Whitby was a captain in the Royal Navy. He fought during the French Revolutionary Wars and Napoleonic Wars. He joined the navy in 1794 as a midshipman.Biographical Memoire. Henry Whitby. Naval Chronicle, Vol. 28, p. 265 He commanded and . He married the second daughter of John Nicholson Inglefield. Naval Chronicle, p. 38 == References == *Trial of Captain Whitby.1812 * The Naval Chronicle: Volume 16, July-December 1806, Volume 16, p. 119 * Naval Court Marshall Category:Royal Navy personnel of the Napoleonic Wars Category:Royal Navy personnel of the French Revolutionary Wars
title: Henry Whitby
